listitem.simpara: During host authorization, the toolkit treats DNs "hostname-*.edu" as equivalent to "hostname.edu". This means that if a service was setup to do host authorization and hence accept the certificate "hostname.edu", it would also accept certificates with DNs "hostname-*.edu".

For example, host "grid.test.edu" would also accept likes of "grid-1.test.edu" or "grid-foo.test.edu". Note though that if a host was set up to accept "hostname-1.edu", it will not accept any of "hostname-*.edu".
A bug has been opened to see if this feature needs to be modfiied.
